_sText:
DE_LITE_RC1 by cashed (released October 2010)

Well worked and interesting by layout bomb/defuse map by Ted 'cashed' McIlwain - author of widely known map de_season and the coauthor of very popular map de_greene. Here is a CSS-transition from one of the map versions for CS.

"Originally a level for Counter-Strike 1.6 competitive play, and created for ESEA and the community by myself. The original map idea was discussed by a panel of top players and community members to attempt a arena top pick. Knowing the restrictions for competitive mapping, I knew it would never get the justice it deserves on goldsrc engine. This rendition includes custom textures and models created by myself, and stock Half-Life 2 and CS:S assets." - from mapauthor's note at tedmcilwain.com

By the way the Fans of Counter-Strike 1.6 can find here at GameBanana FOUR versions of this map: de_lite_rc1, de_lite_rc2, de_lite20100110 and final version de_lite :-)

Despite Release Candidate state the map is absolutely playable also is well good designed!

About Playing with Bots: In original mapauthor's archive Navigation Mesh for playing with Bots was not included, but you can download separately the created from scratch, manually optimized (hand-tuned) and fully place painted NAV-file.

Play and Enjoy!
